item.title: Almeirim Stone Soup
item.description: It is truly emblematic of Portuguese cuisine, as it uses all of the ingredients available in order to waste no food. item.title: Bitoque - Portuguese Steak with Beer Sauce
item.description: Bitoque (pronounced bee-tok) is a traditional quintessential Portuguese dish, its name comes from being cooked in wood burning ovens in the oil mills. Good in combination with red wine, beer sauce that I am going to also provide the ingredients and directions on how to do, rice, french fries and a salad. Ingredients sirloin steaks garlic olive oil q.b. (quanto basta ‚Äì ‚Äòenough‚Äô) medium fat milk beer mustard flour eggs Directions Season the steaks with sliced garlic and salt.
